en-US.html: gabl.ink is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by the International Olympic Committee or any other Olympic organization. OLYMPIAD and related marks are trademarks of their respective owners.

en-GB.html: gabl.ink is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or sponsored by the International Olympic Committee or any other Olympic organisation. OLYMPIAD and related marks are trade marks of their respective owners.

fr.html: gabl.ink n’est ni affilié à, ni approuvé par, ni parrainé par le Comité international olympique, ni par aucune autre organisation olympique. OLYMPIADE et les marques associées sont des marques déposées de leurs propriétaires respectifs.
